PAL.NAME: Calculated Disk IOPS
PAL.DESCRIPTION: A quick overview of the system with calculated disk IOPS.
PAL.QUESTION: List the physical disks that are using RAID5 separated by commas (,). Example: D,E,F. If you don't know, then use the default of NULL.
List the physical disks that are using RAID1, RAID0+1, or RAID10 separated by commas (,). Example: D,E,F. If you don't know, then use the default of NULL.

ANALYSIS.NAME: PhysicalDisk Calculated IOPS

DATASOURCE.NAME: \PhysicalDisk(*)\Calculated IOPS

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This analysis creates a generated counter that estimates the rate of IOs per second (IOPS) that the hardware might be processing given the RAID type. This analysis uses the drives of RAID type user arguments. RAID0 is assumed unless otherwise specified.
